sentences.en: After months of hard work , our plans came to / were brought to fruition.
sentences.cn: 我们经过几个月的苦干,终于实现了计画.

sentences.en: After months of hard work, our plans finally came to fruition .
sentences.cn: 经过几个月的艰苦工作，我们的计划终于完成了。

sentences.en: At last his efforts were coming to fruition.
sentences.cn: 他的努力终于逐渐取得了成效.

sentences.en: Einstein brought this vision to fruition by way of a successful mathematical theory.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦以成功的数学理论的形式把这一预见变成了科学硕果.

sentences.en: Losing weight demands preparation, effort and commitment to come to fruition.
sentences.cn: 减肥的要求准备, 努力和承诺来实现.

sentences.en: Now growth comes to annual fruition, and preparations are completed for another year , another generation.
sentences.cn: 但却是九月让我们不知不觉地感受这种永恒奇迹.

sentences.en: Now that it has come to fruition I am very excited, but also a bit nervous.
sentences.cn: 现在事情有了实质性的进展,我内心充满了激动, 但同时也感到了一丝紧张.

sentences.en: Our efforts have come to fruition.
Some of the current FSA investigations are expected to reach fruition in the next six months, one person said.
sentences.cn: 一人说，目前正在进行的部分金融服务管理局调查有望在未来六个月完成。

sentences.en: Success was the fruition of his years of work.
sentences.cn: 成功是他多年工作的成果.

sentences.en: That's the deceptively simple premise behind a project currently coming to fruition atMassachusetts Institute of Technology.
sentences.cn: 简单地说,这似乎就是麻省理工学院一项科研项目的前提,该项目近来已取得成果.

sentences.en: The essentials of the reward system in science are "peer recognition" of scientists fruition of originality.
sentences.cn: 科学奖励的实质是对科学家独创性成就的“同行承认”。

sentences.en: The time was not far distant when this aspect of the progressive movement come to fruition.
sentences.cn: 进步运动的这一方面获得成功的时日已经不远.

sentences.en: The year also saw two long - term investigations undertaken by a CCB Task Force come to fruition.
sentences.cn: 年内,由商业罪案调查科一支特遣小队负责的两宗冗长调查取得成果.

sentences.en: There is also a pride of achievement if their efforts contribute to its fruition.
sentences.cn: 他们为自身的努力推动了企业成功而自豪.

sentences.en: To come to a satisfactory conclusion or to fruition.
sentences.cn: 他们分别得出了同一结论.

sentences.en: Today, the Chinese are gradually bringing to fruition their hopes of harnessing the mighty Yangtse.
sentences.cn: 现在, 中国人民开发长江水利的宏图,正在逐步变成现实.

sentences.en: Will he not bring to fruition my salvation and grant me my every desire?
sentences.cn: 这约凡事坚稳,关乎我的一切救恩和我一切所想望的,他岂不为我成就 吗 ?

sentences.en: You'll learn whether or not you enjoy the work as well as improve your professional record for seeing things to fruition.
sentences.cn: 你不仅可以知道自己是否喜欢这份工作，也可以因为完成任务而提高你的职业记录。

words.tran_cn: 富有成效的；多产的；果实结得多的
不成功的，徒劳的；不结果实的
圆润的；有果味的；果实状的
果实；结果实；[食品] 水果；成果

trans.tran_en: if a plan, project etc comes to fruition, it is successfully put into action and completed, often after a long process
